definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Physical Chemistry. 5th ed. , P. W. Atkins. , Oxford University Press.
sentences.chinese: 物理化学解题指南，李文斌主编，天津大学出版社。

sentences.english: The function of the chemistry of fuel and engine oil is very important.
sentences.chinese: 汽油和机油组成和物理化学性质的作用也非常重要。

sentences.english: This is the 2002 646 hours, and models.
sentences.chinese: 物理化学这已经是2002六百四十六小时和模型。

sentences.english: Ethylcellulose( EC ) was used as wall materials to prepare EC- propolis microcapsules, by the physical chemistry method.
sentences.chinese: 以乙基纤维素为囊材，采用物理化学法制备蜂胶微囊。

sentences.english: The method is used for the efficiency determination of various antiscale processes founded on chemical or physical principles.
sentences.chinese: 此法可用于评价各种物理化学防垢方法的有效性。

sentences.english: Soil water erosion is a complex physicochemical process.
sentences.chinese: 土壤水蚀是一个复杂的物理化学过程。

sentences.english: Commercial heterogeneous catalysts usually belong to chemical and physical complex systems that have been developed through the catalytic techniques and experiences accumulated for years.
sentences.chinese: 工业多相催化剂是极其复杂的物理化学体系。

sentences.english: Critical micelle concentration is an important physicochemical property of surfactants.
sentences.chinese: 临界胶束浓度是表面活性剂的重要物理化学性质。

sentences.english: This method can be used to estimate physical chemistry batteries capability .
sentences.chinese: 为物理化学电源性能评估提供了新的方法。

sentences.english: We can divide physical chemistry into four main areas.
sentences.chinese: 我们可将物理化学划分为四个主要领域。

sentences.english: The effect of mechanical impact on physical and chemical properties of carbon powders was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了机械力对碳粉物理化学性能的影响规律。

sentences.english: Its physio-chemical properties and chemiluminescent behavior were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了试剂的物理化学性质和化学发光性能。

sentences.english: Introduce the basic physics-chemistry characteristic of Vanilla.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍香草醛的基本物理化学特性。

sentences.english: Microbes are finely tuned to inhabit specific chemical or physical niches where they’ve got an advantage.
sentences.chinese: 微生物能很好地适应它们生活的物理化学环境。

sentences.english: The results show the importance of physicochemical action.
sentences.chinese: 固沙强度主要是物理化学作用而形成的。

sentences.english: Physical chemistry experiment is one of the basic courses in Normal College.
sentences.chinese: 物理化学实验是师范院校化学系的基础课程。

definition: physics and chemistry/to govern and educate
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
calculus/differentiation and integration/calculus of infinitesimals 微 and integrals 積|积
the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])
